WorkItem.Description:
Hi everyone, 
 
I was going through the MVVM Quick Start, and found that the code is quite different from the explanations in the Prism4.chm.
 
E.g. the Prism4.chm says that there's a DataTemplateSelector.cs under \MVVM\MVVM\Infrastructure\ as the data template selector for the viewModels, 
 
while in the current version of the Quick Start, the selector is declared in the QuestionareView.xaml using  <prism:DataTemplateSelector />
WorkItem.Summary: MVVM Quick Start: Prism4.chm is out of sync with the code

Comments.Message:
You can find more information in this thread from the discussion boards:
http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/258573

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
